tool_description:
Fetch music links and metadata for any artist, album, or track from 20+ streaming platforms with a single API call.

Provide an (artist/album/track) URL, track ISRC or album UPC and we’ll deliver back a rich JSON result containing all the platform links and metadata we could find, cleaned and normalized. 

Help your users stream the music featured in your app, no matter which platform they use.

Musicfetch discovers matching content from the following platforms:
- Amazon
- Amazon Music
- Angh...
name: MusicFetch
title: MusicFetch

api_list.name: Lookup by ISRC
api_list.description: Fetch track details and streaming links by ISRC lookup.

required_parameters.name: services
required_parameters.description: amazon, amazonMusic, anghami, audius, audiomack, awa, bandcamp, boomplay, deezer, gaana, iHeartRadio, instagram, appleMusic, itunesStore, jioSaavn, joox, kkbox, lineMusic, napster, netease, pandora, qobuz, qqMusic, sevenDigital, soundcloud, spotify, tidal, tiktok,  wynkMusic, yandex, youtube, youtubeMusic

api_list.name: Lookup by URL
api_list.description: Fetch artist, album, or track details and streaming links by supported platform's URL lookup.

required_parameters.name: services
required_parameters.description: amazon, amazonMusic, anghami, audius, audiomack, awa, bandcamp, boomplay, deezer, gaana, appleMusic, iHeartRadio, itunesStore, jioSaavn, joox, kkbox, lineMusic, napster, netease, pandora, qobuz, qqMusic, sevenDigital, soundcloud, spotify, tidal, wynkMusic, yandex, youtube, youtubeMusic

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer, Tidal, Napster, Pandora, YouTube Music and SoundCloud platforms are supported for URL lookup.

optional_parameters.name: withTracks
optional_parameters.description: true, false (applicable in the case of album)

api_list.name: Lookup by UPC
api_list.description: Fetch album details and streaming links by UPC lookup.

required_parameters.name: services
required_parameters.description: amazon, amazonMusic, anghami, audius, audiomack, awa, bandcamp, boomplay, deezer, gaana, appleMusic, iHeartRadio, itunesStore, jioSaavn, joox, kkbox, lineMusic, napster, netease, pandora, qobuz, qqMusic, sevenDigital, soundcloud, spotify, tidal, wynkMusic, yandex, youtube, youtubeMusic
